column1: We decided to go for dinner because it was Toms 18th birthday.
I phoned the restaurant beforehand so I could go and put up balloons and banners before everyone arrived.
There was lots of food and it was difficult to choose.

column2: I had tomato soup and a bread roll.
I had chicken with mushroom sauce and new potatoes and green vegetables

column1: The waiter brought us a birthday cake and Tom blew out the candles.
We gave a gift of a photo album with pictures of Tom growing up from a baby to 18 years old.
We all had a great time.
